channel.title: The Pudding
channel.description: The Pudding is an editorial publication that explains ideas debated in culture with visual essays.

item.description: We categorized songs in the Billboard Top 10 to see if love songs are on the decline.

item.description: Traditions, trends, and who's wearing what in today's NBA

item.description: This isn’t just a flicking game, but a century-old test of skill and strategy.

item.description: We want fans to have the opportunity to vote and determine the answers.
